item.title: !Please Help!I need the ENTIRE code for PATH and CLASSPATH!PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @B_L_S_M B L S M
item.description:
@B_L_S_M wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:343541”]What code are you using to run/compile the server?[/quote]heres all the codes:
Server compiler:
@echo off
Title NineScape Compiler
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

Server run:
@echo off
Title NineScape
cd …/bin
color 40
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe” Bulby/Server 43594
PAUSE

ClassPath:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Path:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;

Read full topic
